title: Project Management for Beginners
expanded_description: Join our upcoming project management classes for beginners to learn how you can utilize project management to meet users and business needs
description: For beginners who are looking to start a career in project management or for intermediate who are looking to sharpen their project management skills alike.

answer: Anyone looking to build a successful career in project management.
Anyone who is interested in taking the Project Management Professional (PMP) certification exam

requirements.how: This course will be taught using:

payment.order_summary: The project management beginners course is designed to equip project managers and entrepreneurs likewise with profitable roadmaps and resources to start, scale and champion their project management careers. This course will be taught via online live classes and recordings will be provided 3-5 hours after the class for those who missed it.

training_only.name: Training only
training_only.payment_description: For individuals who wants to be trained only
extra_details: Explanation of exam questions and answers

training_with_mentorship.name: Training & Mentorship
training_with_mentorship.payment_description: For individuals who wants to be trained and mentored
extra_details: Explanation of exam questions and answers
Training on the use of some popular PM software
Opportunity to connect with like-minded professionals
Regular attention to real world issues on projects
Full mentorship for as long as you need it
